answers.answer: How long have these headaches been going on? What kind of symptoms come with them?My general rule of thumb is that if you're concerned, you should contact your doc and let them know what is happening. As you have diabetes and high blood pressure, I would *definitely* recommend that you see a doc sooner rather than later to get things checked out.Good luck and keep us posted,~Dame

question: I have been havinga headsche ont he right side of my head, its alraming and I am not sure what causes it.I hve diabetes/high blood pressure .What should I do?  Any suggestions
title: Pain on the right side of my head
